name: Rashmi
greetingText: Aasha Krta hu tere din or raat achhe jaa rahe honge!
text1: Mujhe abhi thodi der pehle yaaad aaya ki aaj k din hi to tu Avtarit hui thi is dharti pr!!! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Janam Din ki hardik shubhkaamnye !...waghera waghera
text2: Ye sb bhejne wala tha phir tera status pr photo lagaane wala tha.
text3: But phir mere mastishk mai ye vihaar aaya ki bhagwaan ne mujhe just ek ghanta pehle smaran krwaya ki tera aaj Janam Diwas hai to kyu na iska sadh upyog kiya jaaye.
text4: Or phir maine vichar kiya jb samay hai hi mere pass or ab mujhe kyuki 1 ghanta jaagna padega tujhe janam diwas ki badhiya dene hetu to kyu na is khaali samay mai tere liye ek uphaar banaya jaaye
outroText: Kaisa laga tujhe tera Gift ? Thoda jladi baazi mai banaya hai 3-4 hr pehle yaad aata to shayad or achha banata or khud ka design soch k banata.
replayText: Sorry tera koi photo hai ne mere phone mai bs yahi tha jo tha. Or agar dobara dekhna hai to CLICK ME.
